title: Sterling Generators collaborates with Pi Green for emission control device - Your Gateway to Power Transmission ... - T&D India
summary: Sterling Generators and Pi Green Innovations collaborate to launch an innovative clean air solution called Retrofit Emission Control Device (RECD), designed to capture particulate matter from engine exhaust efficiently. The technology also utilizes the separated particulate matter as a raw material for various applications, reducing waste and secondary contamination.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is a green innovation as the Retrofit Emission Control Device (RECD) contributes to environmental sustainability goals by reducing particulate matter emissions from engine exhaust, improving air quality, and reusing byproducts as raw materials.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as Sterling Generators and Pi Green Innovations have introduced a new product, the Retrofit Emission Control Device (RECD), as a significant departure from their previous offerings to address environmental concerns and regulatory compliance.
green_product: TRUE. The Retrofit Emission Control Device (RECD) qualifies as a green product as it is designed to significantly reduce environmental impact by capturing particulate matter efficiently, reusing byproducts, and promoting cleaner energy solutions.
green_process: TRUE. The technology behind the Retrofit Emission Control Device (RECD), using Electrostatic Precipitation fundamentals and filter-less technology, qualifies as a green process by minimizing environmental impacts, reducing waste, and promoting sustainability.
company: Sterling Generators Pvt Ltd and Pi Green Innovations
official_company_name: Sterling and Wilson Powergen Pvt Ltd
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335312 - Motor and Generator Manufacturing, 562211 - Hazardous Waste Treatment and Disposal, 562112 - Hazardous Waste Collection, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services
greenwashing: FALSE. This product innovation does not appear to be an example of greenwashing as it focuses on reducing emissions, improving air quality, and reusing byproducts, aligning with environmental sustainability goals.

title: BMW Debuts More Powerful and Lighter F900GS For 2024 - ADV Pulse
summary: BMW unveils a more powerful and lighter F900GS for 2024, along with other updated mid-range adventure models. The new models feature increased capacity, enhanced power output, and improved torque. Changes include weight reduction, new body parts, adjustable features, LED lighting, and increased tech integrations.
